family.name: prices
family.description:
Prices describe the amount of money required to purchase an item or items. The prices resource server links prices to: [items][items], cart line items and [item definitions][itemdefinitions]
[items]: #items [itemdefinitions]: #itemdefinitions

resource.name: price-for-cart-line-item
resource.description: The cart line item price resource.

resource.name: price-for-shipment-line-item
resource.description: The price of the shipment line item.

relationship.name: price-for-item
relationship.description: Read the unit price of an [item][items]. The unit price of an item is the price for one unit (quantity = 1)

relationship.name: price-for-cart-line-item
relationship.description: Read the unit price of a cart line item. The unit price of a cart line item is the price for one unit when a given quantity is purchased (the line item quantity).

relationship.name: lowest-price-for-item-definition
relationship.description: Read the price of the item option with the lowest price. This link will only appear if the item has options.

relationship.name: price-for-shipment-line-item
relationship.description: Retrieves the price of a shipment line item.

entity.name: item-price
entity.description: The unit price of an item.

property.name: list-price
property.description: The unit price of an item before catalog discounts are applied.

property.name: purchase-price
property.description: The unit price of an item after catalog discounts are applied.

entity.name: cart-line-item-price
entity.description: The unit price of an item in the shopper's cart.

property.name: list-price
property.description: The unit price of an item in the shopper's cart before shopping cart discounts are applied.

property.name: purchase-price
property.description: The unit price of an item in the shopper's cart after shopping cart discounts are applied. This represents the price the shopper will actually pay for each unit. If no discounts have been applied, the list and purchase price will be the same.

property.name: from-price
property.description: The starting or the minimum price.

entity.name: shipment-line-item-price
entity.description: The price of a shipment line item.

property.name: list-price
property.description: The price of a shipment line item before discounts are applied.

property.name: purchase-price
property.description: The price of a shipment line item after discounts are applied. If no discounts have been applied, the list and purchase price will be the same.
